com.ibm.team.repository.common.query

Interface IItemQuery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IQuery

    public interface IItemQuery
extends IQuery
    an item query is a type of query used for retrieving the handles of all items matching a set of filter criteria. The result of an item query is an IItemQueryPage
    Since:
    0.5

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.ibm.team.repository.common.query.IQuery

    • Field Detail

      • FACTORY

        static final IQuery.Factory<IItemQuery,IItemQueryModel> FACTORY
        Global factory instance for clients to create new query instances.

        Example usage:

        TeamQueryModel t = TeamQueryModel.ROOT;
        IItemQuery query = IItemQuery.FACTORY.newInstance(t);
